message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thank you for the offer, Alice!  While I appreciate the product, $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for it. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $140. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $140 is still above my budget.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $120.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit on this deal. I can do $130, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great price for a fantastic product, and I think you'll really love it.
